overview: From 2025-11-16 to 2025-11-17, ethereum-optimism/docs had 3 new PRs (2 merged), 2 new issues, and 9 active contributors.

topIssues.title: ENV variables no longer available
topIssues.author: kamikazechaser
topIssues.body:
Previously, there were corresponding ENV variables description to the flags for both op-node and op-geth. Now it seems that only the flags are available e.g. at https://docs.optimism.io/node-operators/guides/consensus-config#consensus-layer-configuration-options-op-node.

Is it possible to restore this without anyone having to run the CLI?

topIssues.title: Update snap sync
topIssues.author: bradleycamacho
topIssues.body:
## Description

https://docs.optimism.io/operators/node-operators/management/snap-sync

Maintain structure, remove the non-snap sync options. Remove the tabs. There should be a feature page added for this too.

## Action items

1. Do research on topic and raise any questions with the docs team
2. Write a first draft. It doesn't have to be worded perfectly as the docs team will review
3. Ping @bradleycamacho on discord and request review
4. Implement feedback from @bradleycamacho 
5. Publish

topPRs.title: docs: add note about L2 vs L1 finality on Optimism
topPRs.author: stalim17
topPRs.body:
This PR adds a short note to the README clarifying the distinction between
UX-level finality on L2 and economic finality on L1.

While transactions can be treated as final for user experience once they are
included in an L2 block, economic finality is only achieved after the
corresponding state root has been posted and finalized on L1.

This helps developers set correct expectations when building on Optimism.
Documentation-only change, no code modifications.

topContributors.summary: sbvegan: Focused on significant documentation refactoring, merging a large PR in ethereum-optimism/docs (#1872) that involved substantial changes across 52 files (+6803/-5299 lines), and also opened another PR to continue organizing documentation.

ajsutton: Primarily focused on maintenance and updates today, merging a PR in `ethereum-optimism/optimism` (#18302) to update to version 1.2.4, which involved minor code changes and a review. Their code changes indicate a focus on bug fixes and configuration adjustments, with some refactoring and test work.

Inphi: Focused on bugfix work, closing an issue related to integration testing of cannon-kona (ethereum-optimism/optimism#17764) and contributing two commits that modified two files with a net change of +6 lines.
jsvisa: Focused on documentation improvements, opening a PR in ethereum-optimism/docs (#1875) to add troubleshooting for `eth_sendRawTransaction` issues, contributing 45 lines of new content.
Antoninoo: Focused on development work, opening a pull request in ethereum-optimism/specs (#862) to add a GitHub Actions workflow for Pylint analysis, which involved modifying 1 configuration file.
kamikazechaser: Today, kamikazechaser's primary contribution was identifying a potential issue with environment variables, which they documented by creating issue ethereum-optimism/docs#1874.
TilakMaddy: Focused on documentation improvement today, creating an issue in ethereum-optimism/docs (#1876) to address incomplete documentation.
Castro1g: Created one issue in ethereum-optimism/community-hub (#1197), indicating a focus on community engagement or documentation.
